messages.en: level 19(post)
Thank you, thank you all……
This place isn’t save, please leave now.
Leave……
Where……could we go then?

messages.zh: 我们把这里当成家......现在，什么都毁了......
messages.en: This was our home……but now, everything’s gone……
……I’m sorry.
You……didn’t do anything wrong.

messages.zh: 自称感染者救星的整合运动居然会攻击感染者。
messages.en: Reunion Movement, the self proclaimed savior of the Infected is actually attacking the Infected.
What a collapse of the image.
However——the infiltration was not spontaneous.

messages.zh: 龙门一定有不少感染者追随了整合运动。
messages.en: Many Infected must have followed Reunion Movement in Lungmen.

messages.zh: 唉，宁可相信整合运动也不相信罗德岛——
messages.en: Sigh, believing Reunion Movement than Rhodes Island——

messages.zh: 毕竟罗德岛不开空头支票。
messages.en: Rhodes Island don’t make empty promises, after all.
Even if it’s only an illusion——

messages.zh: 大多数感染者也会不顾一切，伸手去抓虚无缥缈的救命稻草吧。
messages.en: Most Infected would desperately, reach out for that straw.

messages.zh: 又有谁会选择相信——从不忍心欺骗别人的小兔子呢？
messages.en: Who would choose to believe——the little bunny who can never bear to lie?
……I do.
Misha……?
Ughh……

messages.zh: 小心！你还不能随便走动！
messages.en: Watch out! You can’t walk freely yet!

messages.zh: 只是有点头昏......我没关系的。
messages.en: It’s just dizzy……I’m okay.

messages.zh: 整合运动还会追上来吧？
messages.en: Reunion Movement is still after us, right?
We……

messages.zh: 我明白了。我们立刻动身。
messages.en: I understand. We’ll move at once.

messages.zh: 很快，我们就能离开贫民区，与龙门近卫局会合了。
messages.en: Very soon, we’ll get out of the slum, and meet up with Lungmen Guard Bureau.
